content:
In the defense forces of southern Ukraine, they declared hostile rocket terror and air anxiety in the south, which are heard at an interval of 5-15 minutes in length from an hour to 2.5.

This is stated inmessageGroup.

During the day, the enemy attacked Kherson and Mykolaiv region with various types of rockets.

In the Kherson region, the enemy hit the Balism (probably "Iskander-M") in open territories. People were not injured.

Also from the Black Sea waters tactical aviation was directed by managed aviation missiles on infrastructure sites of Mykolaiv region. One rocket was destroyed. But it was not possible to avoid the hit, the preserved building was damaged.

"The main thing is that people are not damaged," the message said.

As reported by the Armyinform, over the Dnipropetrovsk regionknocked downenemy X-59 rocket.
title: The defense forces told about the rocket terror of the Russians in the south of Ukraine
description: This is stated in the message of the group. During the day, the enemy attacked Kherson and ...
author: Army Inform
